// TODO: The following should eventually be sourced and generated
//       from the main tests within the PDSL
const helpers = require("pdsl/helpers");

const assert = require("assert");

assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.not(helpers.or(helpers.val(null), helpers.val(undefined))))(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.obj("name"))({
  name: "foo"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(true)(true), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.obj(helpers.entry("name", helpers.pred(a => a.length > 10))))({
  name: "12345678901"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.extant)(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.extant)(null), false);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.and(helpers.arrTypeMatch(helpers.prim(Number)), helpers.arrLen(5)))([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]), true);
assert.strictEqual(helpers.val(helpers.regx(helpers.Email))("email@example.com"), true);
